metadata.title: PAS Legal Corp - Immigration Consultants
metadata.description: Specialized immigration consultants with offices in Orlando, Dubai, and Jeddah. Immigration services in the United States, UAE, and Saudi Arabia.

hero.headline: We are your specialized immigration consultants
hero.subtext: With offices on three continents: Orlando, Dubai, and Jeddah

global.title: Three Continents
global.description: With offices in Orlando, Dubai, and Jeddah, we are where you need us.

process.subtitle: Simple steps to achieve your immigration goals

step1.description: Tell us about your case and we evaluate your immigration situation

step3.description: We guide you every step of the way until you achieve your goals

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about our history and mission

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide high-quality immigration consulting services, helping our clients achieve their goals correctly and efficiently.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading international immigration consulting firm, recognized for our excellence, integrity, and commitment to our clients.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Immigration solutions tailored to your needs
services.teamDescription: Our team of experts will guide you through the entire process, ensuring your application is submitted correctly and on time. We have years of experience helping clients like you achieve their immigration goals.
services.ctaDescription: Schedule a free consultation and start your process today.
services.step1Desc: We evaluate your case and determine the best strategy
services.step2Desc: We help you gather all the necessary documentation
services.step3Desc: We complete and review all forms
services.step4Desc: We submit your application and monitor its progress
services.faq1Question: How long does the process take?
services.faq1Answer: The time varies depending on the type of case and individual circumstances. During your initial consultation, we will provide an estimate based on your specific situation.
services.faq2Answer: The required documents depend on the type of service. We will provide a detailed list during your consultation.
services.faq3Answer: Yes, we offer video call consultations for your convenience, regardless of your location.

greenCard.title: Permanent Residence (Green Card)
greenCard.description: We help in the process of obtaining the Green Card for permanent residence in the United States.

workPermit.description: Advice for obtaining employment authorization in the United States.

familyPetition.title: Family Petitions
familyPetition.description: Family reunification through petitions from citizens and residents.

asylum.title: Asylum
asylum.description: Protection for people fleeing persecution in their home countries.

visaU.title: U Visa (Crime Victims)
visaU.description: Visa for victims of serious crimes who cooperate with authorities.

visaVAWA.title: VAWA Visa
visaVAWA.description: Self-petition for victims of domestic abuse married to citizens or residents.

humanTrafficking.title: Human Trafficking Visa
humanTrafficking.description: Protection for victims of human trafficking and exploitation.

visaEB2.title: EB-2 Visa
visaEB2.description: Work visa for professionals with advanced degrees.

waiver.title: Waiver
waiver.description: Forgiveness for inadmissibilities that prevent legal entry to the U.S.
